description:
Welcome to VTPP Phitsanulok Airport in Microsoft Flight Simulator! üåç This addon by SaimFlight brings the vibrant Phitsanulok Airport to life with stunning detail and realism. Located just 3 kilometers from the city center, this airport features a fully modeled main terminal, animated jetways, and various hangars. With high-resolution textures, custom ground textures, and accurately named runways and taxiways, this addon enhances your flight simulation experience. Whether you're navigating commercial flights or exploring the scenic surroundings, VTPP Phitsanulok Airport is a must-have for all aviation enthusiasts. Download now and elevate your flight simulation adventures! üöÄ
